payloads.name: System Information
payloads.command:
echo '=== System Info ===' && uname -a && echo '
=== Uptime ===' && uptime && echo '
=== Memory ===' && free -h && echo '
=== CPU Info ===' && cat /proc/cpuinfo | grep -E '(model name|processor)' | head -n 4
payloads.description: Comprehensive system information summary (kernel, uptime, memory, CPU)
payloads.author: MetaPayload

payloads.name: Disk Usage (df)
payloads.command: df -h && echo && echo '--- Largest Directories ---' && du $TARGET_PATH | sort -nr | head -n 15
payloads.description: Display filesystem usage and identify largest directories
payloads.author: MetaPayload

payloads.name: Process List (ps)
payloads.description: Display running processes list with specified number of lines
payloads.author: MetaPayload

payloads.name: Top Processes (top)
payloads.description: Display top processes snapshot with CPU and memory usage
payloads.author: MetaPayload

payloads.name: Process Grep (pgrep)
payloads.description: Search for processes by name pattern (FILTER_STRING: use regex pattern, '.' for all)
payloads.author: MetaPayload

payloads.name: Network Connections (netstat)
payloads.description: Display active network connections and listening ports (netstat)
payloads.author: MetaPayload

payloads.name: Install Package (opkg)
payloads.description: Update package lists and install a specific package via opkg
payloads.author: MetaPayload

payloads.name: Find Files by Name (find)
payloads.description: Recursively search for files by name pattern
payloads.author: MetaPayload

payloads.name: Find File Content (grep -r)
payloads.description: Recursively search file contents for pattern (GREP_OPTIONS: -i=case-insensitive)
payloads.author: MetaPayload
